category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PartitionableModelDisplayNameColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Specifies the column names displayed in the Content Explorer tree for a partitionable model (for example, a partition template) and its contents. The columns widths are specified in the PartitionableModelShownColumnWidthsPref preference. Valid Values: One or more valid property names.
